name: HSP_BKT_EXCL_DATES
description: This table shows date ranges that were excluded from a bucket.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXCL_RNG_ST_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the start of the date range for excluding charges from a bucket.

columns.name: EXCL_RNG_END_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the end of the date range for excluding charges from a bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.
